cause.description: Welcome to the official Genocide Intervention Network Cause! We encourage our members to start their own Causes as well -- check out some of our featured Causes on Facebook! =============================== Our members envision a world in which the global community is willing and able to protect civilians from genocide and mass atrocities. As part of the anti-genocide movement, we raise both money and political will for civilian protection initiatives around the world. Our landmark anti-genocide tools include the 1-800-GENOCIDE hotline and the Darfur congressional scorecard. =============================== - Join Our Facebook Group Now to End Genocide! - Be Our MySpace Anti-Genocide Friend! =============================== 1. The world has a responsibility to protect civilians from genocide and mass atrocities. 2. Ending genocide requires a permenant anti-genocide constituency. 3. Everyone can have a hand in stopping genocide. 4. PLEASE INVITE YOUR FRIENDS to our cause! This is the most important first step you can take!
cause.mission: To empower individuals and communities with the tools to prevent and stop genocide.
cause.name: Genocide Intervention Network: Have a Hand in Stopping Genocide
